name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Mary Go Round
storyline: You've been living a miserable life after marrying your first love. One day, you get hit by a meteor shower, and you're suddenly 18 years old again! In this most brilliant chapter of your life, you get another shot at choosing your first love. Who will it be? The man you passionately loved, or the man who'll become a CEO in the future?
summary: Mary Go Round is an original maybe series romance visual novel. You’ve been living a miserable life after marrying your first love. One day, you end up in a meteor shower, and you’re suddenly the young age of 18 again, getting another shot at choosing your first love. Who will it be? The man you loved, or the CEO-to-be?
